q_ch: Sophia的订单创建时间是什么时候？
gt:
Sure thing! Let's find out when Sophia's order was created. 🎉

| Customer Name | Order Creation Date     |
|---------------|-------------------------|
| Sophia        | March 18, 2024          |

Sophia's order was created on March 18, 2024. If you have any more questions, feel free to ask! 😊

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'Sophia';
steps.description: Retrieve the customer ID for the customer with the name "Sophia"

steps.sql: SELECT created_at FROM orders WHERE user_id = '5';
steps.description: Retrieve the creation time of the order placed by the customer "Sophia"

response:
Hey there! 😄

I've got the information you were looking for. Here's when Sophia's order was created:
